Job Posting:168491 - Position: S25 Backend Engineer Intern 168491B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 04/15/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 04/08/2025 11:04 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Coalition San Francisco JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Backend Engineer Intern 168491B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List About the role This particular internship opportunity will be contributing to the vital efforts of our Accounts and Agencies team in our engineering organization. Here's a quick overview of what they do: Curious about the day in the life of an intern? • Interns at Coalition will be able to work remotely thus giving you the flexibility of working in an environment of your choice • Did I mention that our internships are paid and full-time? • You will be paired with your very own mentor that will be your source of guidance and direction during your internship • Duration: 10-14 weeks (ideally) • An intern project will be decided between you and your mentor • The ability to meet senior technical and business leaders across the company • At the end of your internship, you will have the ability to showcase your completed project and reflect on your time at Coalition • You will gain some exceptional experience in a fast-paced, fun and inclusive environment PLUS...there could be potential for post-internship career opportunities • We believe in saying "yes" when it comes to venturing into the ever-changing world of tech. Your fellow teammates are right there with you. All of our individual successes contribute to the larger success of the company. One for all and all for one! It's that time. Let's take a closer look at the role responsibilities and qualifications. Responsibilities Design and code the right solutions starting with broadly defined problems • • Find and build unique solutions to implement projects from the idea phase to production • Test and iterate code before and after production release • Work in an agile environment to deliver high quality software Job Requirements Skills and Qualifications Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Math, • Physics, or related field • You are entering your 4th year at university or final year for an advanced degree • Knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals such as data structures, problem solving, databases • Comfortable in one or more programming languages like Go, Python Ability to participate in a full-time internship between June-August • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Coalition Inc. Careers | Opportunity for you Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
